channel.title: T20 World Cup on BalleWale Cricket News
channel.description: Recent content in T20 World Cup on BalleWale Cricket News

item.title: Namibia Bank on Kirsten's Experience of Indian Conditions as They Begin T20 World Cup Campaign
item.description: Namibia looks to leverage Gary Kirsten's expertise in Indian conditions as they kick off their T20 World Cup journey.

item.title: Munsey and Leask Spoil Italy's T20 World Cup Debut
item.description: Scotland's Munsey and Leask shine in T20 World Cup opener, defeating Italy in their first match at the tournament.

item.title: Italy Opt to Bowl First Against Scotland in ICC T20 World Cup Qualifier
item.description: Italy chooses to bowl first against Scotland in the ICC T20 World Cup Qualifier, with Brad Wheal making his debut for the Scottish side.

item.title: Italy Captain Wayne Madsen Injures Shoulder in T20 World Cup Opener
item.description: Italy's Wayne Madsen suffers a shoulder injury during the T20 World Cup opener, raising concerns for the team's campaign.

item.title: Zimbabwe Look to Hit the Ground Running Against Oman in T20 World Cup Qualifiers
item.description: Zimbabwe aims for a strong start against Oman in the T20 World Cup qualifiers, seeking to secure a spot in the prestigious tournament.
